body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Steven Powell. May I have your name, please?

Hi Steven, this is Linda Thompson.

Hi Linda, how can I assist you today?

I'm quite frustrated with the security at the music school. I feel like it's not sufficient.

I'm sorry to hear that, Linda. Could you tell me more about the specific issues you're experiencing?

There have been several occasions when I've noticed the doors are unlocked when they shouldn't be.

I understand your concern. For verification purposes, could you please provide me with the last four digits of your contact number?

Sure, the last four digits are one zero one two.

Thank you, Linda. I also need your student ID number to proceed.

It's two three four five six.

Thanks for that information. I’ll make sure to address these security concerns with the management immediately. I appreciate your patience.

Thanks, Steven. I hope to see some changes soon.

You're welcome, Linda. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Have a great day!

You're welcome, Linda. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Have a great day!
